p: The electronic literature search identified 1104 records, published between 1969 and July 2017, of which 118 met the inclusion criteria (Fig. 3). Study design and clinical domains addressed in the articles were identified for 110 of the articles. There were no systematic reviews, meta-analysis, or RCTs identified. Two were non-randomized controlled studies, 34 cohort studies (some of which included before and after comparisons), 4 case-control studies, 12 cross-sectional studies, 27 case series, and 31 case reports (Table 2).
